website_summaries.verdict: Another affordable choice for buyers seeking a lower bed frame with wooden slats.
pros: Unique frame design works well in any contemporary home
Steel frame with thick, wood slats
Non-slip tape on wooden slats to keep beds from moving

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware. Bed frame breaks and manufacturer does not respond.
customer_reviews.text: We've had the King-size bed frame for three months. It's used by two average weight adults with a Tuft & Needle mattress on top. In three short months, the two support bars in the middle have completely bent and no longer support the bed in the middle. Sure, we have fun in bed - but it's not like we're monkeys. I've sent two support requests to the manufacturer, and no word back. Based on the quality of the product, the poor customer service, and the false warranty, I can't recommend this bed at all. No matter how cheap it is.
customer_reviews.author: snoop

customer_reviews.title: Amazon customer service will not help you on this!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and it came missing a piece. I contacted Amazon and was told there was nothing they could do other than have me return it. So I’ve been trying. It has been scheduled to be picked up 3 times now (for a defective and useless item that is extremely heavy, bulky, and for which I can’t get all the actual pieces back in the box and closed anyway), yet no one has come to pick it up as scheduled. Amazon is putt8 g me through hell on this and I’m furious. This is not what I expect and I advise you not to buy this item for fear you will endure the same.
customer_reviews.author: Jenidc16

customer_reviews.title: Took like 20 minutes
customer_reviews.text: probably the easiest item I've ever assembled in my life. Took like 20 minutes. I could have been drunk on a bottle of wine and pain pills and not messed this up. it comes in a big, long box where all parts are separated and wrapped, clear directions and screws with a hex key. follow the numbers, link everything, throw down the wood slats and you and the Miss will be testing it's stability in no time at all (it's stable and sturdy, we checked). Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, and has amazing amount of room for storage ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, and has amazing amount of room for storage underneath! but 3 months into using the frame the metal bent on itself in a few places. Adding to review, I email the company and had amazing help with getting a new frame sent out as a replacement! Thank you guys!
customer_reviews.author: liz Ros

customer_reviews.title: Critical Crossbeam arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: Pretty bummed about this one. The main Crossbeam for the foot of the bed was heavily damaged on arrival. The packaging wasn't damaged at all, which means it left the factory like this. Can't recommend this product with this lack of quality.
customer_reviews.author: jtf8044

customer_reviews.title: A great bed frame
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and very sturdy. I love having the extra storage space under it. One customization that I made, because I have a foam mattress (vacuum packed, shipped to home mattress), I replaced the slats with 3/4 inch plywood. I had to cut down the plywood down to size to work, but it provides the needed platform for the mattress. (a recommended upgrade for any bed frame really).
customer_reviews.author: Brian M

customer_reviews.title: Elegant and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bed. It's all set up and had no issues doing so. Had all the pieces and was well labeled. It's feels a little shorter than we thought it'd be but the dimensions are correct. Finish is correct as well. Nice work :)
customer_reviews.author: A. Strike

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Overall design is exactly what I was expecting. Where this product falls short in my opinion is: 1 - the spacing between slats is too far apart at almost 3.5 inches & 2 - the slats are only .5 inches thick The combination of the 2 'defects' causes flexion and my mattress bulges somewhat between the slats. Had I known about these 2 details prior to purchase, I would have not bought.
customer_reviews.author: ConsumerX

customer_reviews.title: and would have left a wonderful review if customer support would’ve called me back
customer_reviews.text: Product itself seems well built, and would have left a wonderful review, if it wasn’t for my bed frame arriving a missing support beam and hardware, since bought hardware from Home Depot. And rigged it so I’m not sleeping on the floor. I called zinus customer support and was put on hold, but given the option to leave a message with a “prompt return of my call” Two days later and still waiting on the “prompt” return call so I can get my bed parts in. Now editing this review as I’m moving out of the place years later. Never heard from them, would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: joe kelly

customer_reviews.title: This frame... I bought this to replace ...
customer_reviews.text: Turns out this cant handle a lot of play time... my frame sheared at a connection point. This frame... I bought this to replace a very squeaky, rusted, and tired bed frame that could no longer handle my erm... adult pursuits. It performed rather admirably then gave up the fight one evening, shearing off in a moment of excess. Goodnight sweet prince....
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Pliskin

customer_reviews.title: Terrible condition!!!! Don't buy!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is so awful, don't waste your money on this. It's in terrible condition, completely beaten up with dents and parts where the paint came off and you can see the silver metal underneath, I am not happy. I attached photos of some of the damage. Horrible product.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Hamwey

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Hubs had it put together in about 15 minutes. It's sturdy and so far has made no noise. I will definitely update if there are any issues. Update as of may 4th 2018. So far so good. Has held up amazingly well and hasn’t made a sound. (Many reported that it squeaks). I am a hefty woman and me and the hubs like to get busy...a lot. No issues so far. I’ve also gotten several inquiries into where I got it. So if you’re on the fence, get it.
customer_reviews.author: K Jones

customer_reviews.title: So easy
customer_reviews.text: Does what it's supposed to do, looks exactly like the stock photo, and incredibly easy to assemble! I put this together by myself with two crawling adventurous toddlers "helping" me. Which obviously was the absolute opposite of helpful! Even with my little setback helpers I got this put together in less then 30 minutes and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job
customer_reviews.text: It does a great job and raises my bed slightly. I also used my boxspring with it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike F

customer_reviews.title: I'm really satisfied with this mattress foundation
customer_reviews.text: I'm really satisfied with this mattress foundation. It was pretty simple and straight forward to put together with a friend. I'm 200+ pounds and the frame holds my weight. I feel supported on it and there is no squeaking.
customer_reviews.author: paige

customer_reviews.title: Sleek modern and very easy to build
customer_reviews.text: I bought this queen platform bed because I liked the contemporary look of it. It is very nice and seems sturdy. I haven't tried any adult activities on it but I don't see a problem at all. I slept like a baby the first night I had it. I don't use a box spring and have a regular mattress (not the foam ones). It's a great deal for the price and extremely easy to build. I did it by myself in under 30 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Mercedes Osejo

customer_reviews.title: Easy and great platform bed.
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly -20 minutes tops. No extra tools required. Bought this bed so my dog wouldn't go under my bed with stolen products like my shoes and brushes lol. She loves this new bed easier to jump on and it's lower to the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Abundis

customer_reviews.title: A year and a half later and it’s in the trash.
customer_reviews.text: A year and a half later, this bed frame is broken and thrown out. Within 6 months of having it, it began to squeak. A little at a time. By the time it broke down, it would wake up everyone in the house every time I moved. I continuously had to get under it and retighten the screws, but that didn’t stop it from breaking. I had high hopes for it, and have been totally let down.
customer_reviews.author: CG

customer_reviews.title: I love this bed
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in a slim box, so easy to maneuver into my apartment. The bed was easy to put together (took less than 30 minutes from start to finish), and it looks stylish, classy, and much more expensive than it was! The slats are good quality and although unfinished are sanded and smooth. They fit easily on the bed frame and the velcro attachment is a nice addition. The whole thing is sturdy, does not squeak, and readily supports a 10 inch mattress and my plump physique without any concerns. I've already slept on it a few nights, but will update later if my opinion changes. Update after 3 months of use: I continue to be 100% satisfied. Buy with confidence!
customer_reviews.author: MyLikeIt

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty impressed by the bed frame. It is pretty well designed and well constructed with all the holes lining up well. It is pretty easy to set up and took us less than a half hour. I didn't have much of an expectation about the wooden slats based on my previous experience with other bed frames. However, these slats are attached to the frame with Velcro and they seem put. There are also anti slip pads that are attached to the bed frame which is supposed to keep the mattress in place. It is also pretty light weight. Overall, pretty happy with the purchase and hope it lasts long.
customer_reviews.author: SD

customer_reviews.title: So happy with this frame!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 6 inch for my toddler & thev18 inch for myself. We live in a very tiny place with next to no storage. This frame allows me to store stuff under the beds. Hers just has toys & vacuumed sealed blankets under it. Mine has all of the totes that were stacked in my room and there's still room for more stuff underneath there. I'm short & have a 12 inch mattress so total it is now more than half my height but totally worth it!! It assembles really easily. I had both done in less that 30 minutes (with a toddler assistant) and they are very sturdy. Plus the assembly tools included are great.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi C

customer_reviews.title: Great bed frame for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bed for the price. Looks exactly as pictured. Assembly took about 20 minutes and was super easy- all the parts were labeled so you didn’t even really need the instructions. I added my own gripper pads on every corner and the middle legs so that it wouldn’t scratch my floors and wouldn’t slide all over the place. I’ve had no problems. No squeaking yet. Anyone on here complaining about floor scratching or moving should have put a little thought into it and stuck some floor grippers down there. No reason to lower the review for your own lack of forethought.
customer_reviews.author: Tori B

customer_reviews.title: So one side of the bed doesn’t have a good support. Even with that
customer_reviews.text: They sent us a wrong part, it is for a full not a queen. So one side of the bed doesn’t have a good support. Even with that, it still holds up. However, we have to tighten the screw all the time because they come loose very easily and start to squeak. Also, our bed does not fit perfectly into the frame and we have to adjust it every now and again. This is such a hassle and not worth what we paid for it at all. Do not recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey

customer_reviews.title: Middle legs were too short
customer_reviews.text: Really love the look of this bed frame, but like other reviewers, my set had faulty parts. The two middle legs (I think they were pieces "5"?) were about a quarter inch too short. Super frustrating since they are basically the last pieces to put together. I wasn't about to return the bed, but I'm pretty unsatisfied with the matter. I used two furniture felt pads (cut down) to make up for the lacking length. Worked out for my first night, but I can't imagine they will last very long. Overall, the bed looks fantastic, but I'm guessing I'll have to buy a new frame within the same year, so this was a waste of my money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly, seems sturdy, low to the ground
customer_reviews.text: This was incredibly easy to set up - took me about 20 minutes from box to finish, tools included. It seems sturdy enough, 10 days in. No squeaking (my biggest worry) or wobbling. It's about a foot off the ground. So, unless you've got a boxspring, be prepared to have your sheets on the ground or to tuck them under your bed. I do wish the packaging had been a little less wasteful though...not sure why they plastic wrapped the styrofoam.
customer_reviews.author: Marie F.

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 would recommend
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this frame! It was easy to assemble and had very clear, easy to read instructions. It was the smoothest time my husband and I have ever had putting together a piece of furniture! It feels very sturdy. The slats are held in place with Velcro and there is ant-slip tape and pads all around the edges to keep the mattress in place. We just got the 10” and it’s the perfect height for our pillow top. My feet barely touch the ground. I love the minimalist design. Time will tell if it holds up, but so far I’m impressed!
customer_reviews.author: AB92

customer_reviews.title: Everything about this is first class. Well done.
customer_reviews.text: You can tell this company takes pride in what they do, and well they should. Very sturdy and well made and very well packaged, with every part individually wrapped. I don't believe I've ever been as satisfied with any product that required assembly as I was with this bed frame. It was actually a joy to put together - the steps were intuitive and the tolerances exact. Zero problems. If you can count to ten, you will have no problems at all putting it together. They even included a small ratchet wrench for the fasteners - totally unnecessary in my opinion, but totally cool! Also included was a set of "spare" fasteners, just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Twin bed without adequate support.
customer_reviews.text: I research frames for a twin mattress without using box spring. The pictures and video both show a middle support bar but mine did not come with one and with mattress the middle sinks and the slats bend down. Just a matter of time for the thin support boards to sag. I don’t have time to return as they were purchased for upcoming company and I don’t have time to get something else here so I now need to scramble and find a way to add support. I do not recommend this frame for someone looking for long term without added support.
customer_reviews.author: sewnuts

customer_reviews.title: Works great for a quick fix not meant for long term
customer_reviews.text: Bed worked great for a year then fell apart. It has plenty of storage underneath and works great for small spaces. If your looking for something quick and cheap. This is the way to go. Long term? I would invest into a better bed because this one won’t last you more then a year. Plus it gets very squeaky after awhile. Something I keep noticing with all metal frames. My daughters wooden bed that I bought at the same time has lasted with no breaks or squeaks. It’s great for short term to save up for a better bed, not meant for a permanent piece of furniture in your bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Morado

customer_reviews.title: Got more than we paid for.
customer_reviews.text: We have a Zinus mattress, with a 3” memory foam topper, it’s one of the most comfortable sleep setups I’ve ever experienced; it was a no-brainer to order this frame with that kind of success. We got more than we paid for. It’s sturdy, easily assembled, fits the mattress like it was... ...built for it... and isn’t squeaky, either. We can fit a ton of stuff under it, too, for better or for worse. It’s easy to clean underneath, too, if you use containers to stow stuff. Get this if you like to sleep. Also get this if you like sleeping well without spending half your annual earnings.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie+Casey

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this product is well thought out. The instructions are simple, clear, and well written. The bed comes packaged with all of the Styrofoam contained in plastic bags so the bits don't end up scattered everywhere. There is a small ratcheting wrench included that makes tightening all of the fasteners a breeze. The fastener set comes with extras in case you lose or strip one. Velcro on the underside of the slats makes for easy install and keeps them from sliding around. Once assembled the frame is very sturdy. This thing does not feel like a cheap budget frame. It looks and feels like a premium minimalist piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla + Danni

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.text: highly DO NOT recommend. i got this because i got my daughter one for her twin size bed which has been great! I feel a king is too big for such little structure. The supposed slats fall out of place constantly. The small support beam in the middle if so fragile it has broken 2x in the last month of use. Bought in February 2020, assembled April 2020 it is now first week of August 2020 and I'm having to put my mattress on the floor because it's not safe to sleep on. Highly dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Mcfarland

customer_reviews.title: Cool bedframe, but a little low to the ground
customer_reviews.text: This bed frame is designed beautifully, so easy to put together, and sturdy one you have it together. I highly recommend. The only thing to note is that it's a little lower than most other bed frames, so you may want to invest in a box spring as well if you want a higher bed, but if it's not an issue, then enjoy this minimalist design and how well it functions!
customer_reviews.author: Leah Kay

customer_reviews.title: Had to adjust center legs...now perfect!
customer_reviews.text: We love this platform! We use it with a Ghostbed mattress and it is perfect. The reason I gave it 4 stars is because I had to trim the center legs for them to work properly. It looks like they were designed without taking the plastic foot caps into account. Therefor, they were just long enough to throw off the geometry and cause the legs to twist to the side due to being too long. I took of the caps, trimmed off 1/4", and placed the caps back on. The bad is now rock solid. Also, if using straight on wood flooring, I HIGHLY recommend nonskid feet for under the corners, side, and center legs.
customer_reviews.author: Dan C Williams

customer_reviews.title: Bedframe bent in 2 nights use. :(
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. Great for one night- then we noticed it wobbling when we were rolling over that morning. Looked underneath and the middle support beam is starting to bend and the support bars are splaying out sideways. Such a bummer:( Had such high hopes for this bed frame as it was going to help my knees being so high up. Amazon was amazingly helpful and gets 5 stars for a easy refund and return process.
customer_reviews.author: goatface

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and strong
customer_reviews.text: If only everything in life were this easy. A 10 year old could put this together. It is very strong. I expect it to last many years. I put this together by myself, a 110 lb woman. This is like the Ikea you always dreamed of. Great price, great product and EASY to assemble. No more laughing at Ikea when you read the "easy to assemble" instructions! LOL
customer_reviews.author: Anne MarieTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Don’t do it..
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice and is relatively easy to assemble..and that’s it ..we had it barely three months and slept terribly on it. No matter how much you adjust screws it creaks and is rickety, me and my partner are average weight adults mind you and just rolling over at night wakes each other up from the noise....just spend the money and get a better frame
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Great simple foundation. Buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very early review, so it'll be updated if anything comes up. First off, this frame is incredibly easy to put together.... And I mean INCREDIBLY easy. I put two together, by myself, in less than ten minutes. That's impressive for me. Now, the salt supports..... They're held in place by Velcro. This makes it really easy to put them on, but I fear it'll be TOO easy for them to no longer work, as opposed to being screwed in. Guess we'll find out down the road! Also, very simple, very minimalistic. Excellent for what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: A-moon-amous

customer_reviews.title: fell apart
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: After 4 months of use, the center supports ripped through the frame and the bed now wobbles and creaks. I fear it will collapse very soon. Absolutely not worth the money. Buy something sturdier unless this is a guest bed that will not be regularly used. Easy to put together on my own and pretty sturdy. Looks nice and has storage area underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Megz

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this bed frame or any frame from this company. It will start bending after less than 6 months and eventually fail. I have stupidly bought three of these frames so far thinking they would not have the same issue. Don't be like me! Don't buy this bed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Junk broke and was hardly used save your money don't buy it.
customer_reviews.text: This is a piece of junk. Hardly used it but tonight my daughter was going to stay over but when she was sleeping it broke. It seems it broke in the metal post under bed just snapped. Do not buy this it is junk and does not last had it 6 months hardly used and breaks needless to say my daughter is sleeping on the couch tonight. Now I need to find a replacement if anyone stay over again. So thanks for junk thanks for my daughter on the floor when she was sleeping never will purchase from this company again keep your junk.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I needed something cheap and quick as I had a mattress but no bed frame and I had not figured out what I want long term. I am amazed at the quality of this product and how simple and easy it is to assemble. It comes with everything you need to put it together using the tools! I am super happy I bought this frame. My only regret is that perhaps I should have gotten the taller one to have more storage space underneath but this one has space so I can’t complain.
customer_reviews.author: Littlebird

customer_reviews.title: Easy, sturdy, quiet
customer_reviews.text: This frame was ridiculously easy to put together and went quite quickly. It feels very sturdy. I've only spent two nights on it, but so far, it is also very quiet. I really did not take any measurements to see how tall my bed would actually be, and in hindsight, I might've chosen a 14" instead, but truthfully, I'm not bothered by the added height - it's just a little tricky for my very small dogs to get up, but they're not supposed to be on the bed anyway....
customer_reviews.author: littlewolf21

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Listen. If you’re the type of person who has to have someone else build your IKEA furniture for you because you just feel so lost and confused (like me lol) then you may need a little guidance putting this together. But just a little! Overall, it really wasn’t bad at all. So far it feels really sturdy, no squeaks, and there’s room underneath for storage! Look through the photo reviews for the guy who tells you which containers to buy from the container store. Literally lifesaving.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: No Quality Control
customer_reviews.text: Both the box and product arrived damaged. When I opened the packaging, I quickly noticed that several of the zip ties had already been cut. Some of the metal parts were bent and had scratches. One piece had yellow paint on it. A few of the wood slats were also damaged. It's as if I received a bed frame that had been used and then later returned. I sent it back and will not be getting a replacement. Zinus seems to have a strong lack of quality and inventory control.
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: Structurally weak in center
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this bed after roommate enjoyed the 8" model. Design is slightly different, center pole supported by two long free-standing legs rather than pegging into a mirrored bar underneath. This causes weight to press down on the legs, causing them to warp and twist to the side. This causes the bed to "walk" as well as a noticeable sag. While at 300LBS I am heavier than most, i am well below the weight of two people expected to sleep in bed. Issue would be solved if the design had a lower bar running the length that support legs bracketed into. Currently looking to modify bed so as to not have total loss
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Smaller Beds
customer_reviews.text: This platform bed is really easy to install and it looks industrial amazing! I absolutely love how it looks and the sturdiness of it. This is perfect for a full bed for and eleven year old. I feel that this set up is great for a smaller size however, I considered this for our spare king bed but do not feel that this particular setup would work for larger beds.
customer_reviews.author: lil stormster

customer_reviews.title: easier than IKEA to assemble
customer_reviews.text: The instructions were dead simple, and they even included a ratcheting hex wrench! The bolts were not loose in a bag but in a plastic/cardboard-back container, which made handling them and selecting the correct bolt very easy. The wood slats have velcro holding them in place, so they won't shift around, and two of the top-facing slats have peel-off sticky sections to hold the mattress in place.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry H.

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.text: Not built correctly. I didn't see any prior reviews with this mistake but there is an obvious build error for the center supports, as shown in pictures. I'm actually debating between drilling it out and dealing with it rather than waiting longer and dealing with the return/exchange process. Item is out of stock now and the replacement will probably just come with the same mistake. I bought this frame as a base to modify and customize so I was already gonna void the warranty personally but others will be deeply disappointed. Btw, NO I didn't just assemble it wrong or read the instructions wrong lol. I checked my sanity before writing this review. See pictures
customer_reviews.author: ABRAHAM E PLATA

customer_reviews.title: Hipster Bed Frame! Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I got this without hesitation and completely LOVE IT!! Its a complete game changer for anyone’s room! I got the 18’ frame and it gives me so much clearance for underbed storage but if you were to keep it empty, the design alone works with any room template/theme and makes it look sexy and sleek. Very sturdy and easy to assemble! My little brother and I were able to assemble it in 30 minutes. Could of been less but it was a great way to teach him basic assembly and allowed him to actually do some of it himself ! That should say something!! Super happy! I recommend to anyone on the fence to just do it.
customer_reviews.author: J Luna

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY ZINUS BRAND!
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived missing all screws, two pieces of the frame, the tool to assemble & the instructions! It was WORTHLESS & UNUSABLE! Many calls to the company involved being told twice that this was a warranty issue & they could not do anything to help or correct the item! Waste of time, waste of money & lots of frustration! The company could have mailed 16 screws & 2 5 inch pieces to correct this & make the frame work, but that was too much to ask from ZINUS!!! Spend your money with a different company. I would give them ZERO stars if that was an option!
customer_reviews.author: TerryS

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't build it - please see pics! I worked ...
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy it! Couldn't build it - please see pics! I worked so hard to try to do it on my self and when I was about to finish it I saw it couldn't connect to each other because of this bump. update - its been over 2 weeks and I'm still sleeping on the floor - they didn't refund me or did anything to solve this situation faster!!! stay away!
customer_reviews.author: shir

customer_reviews.title: Corner weld did not hold up
customer_reviews.text: The welds did not hold up well at the end of the bed, where we sit at times to put our shoes on. The weld between the frame and the feet of the corner broke and that corner now lacks any support. There was no real way to fix it without a welder, what I ended up doing is putting a piece of wood under the frame at that corner (basically added an additional leg) so that the wood absorbs the weight instead of the frame. It was cheap and easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Trendy, sturdy and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Before purchasing this item, I saw all the specifications and the product is exactly as specified. No, there is not a lot of storage, but I knew that even before buying. Underbed storage can be kept, but can not be rolled out because of the bottom rod. Also, they can be visible. Anyway, I like the bed, it looks great and the empty space under the bed gives an illusion of a bigger room.
customer_reviews.author: Chitralekha Chakraborty

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, quiet and easily assembled.
customer_reviews.text: I like this frame alot. It's nice and high which allows for ample storage underneath. It was easy to assemble. It took me about 90 mins ro complete with no additional help. The instructions are clear and all parts are labled nicely. Zinus even includes a rachet to assist with assembly. I am 6' and 230 pounds. As suggested by other reviewers I applied Loctite blue to every bolt during initial assembly. I have not heard a single sound from the frame since I assembled it 3 weeks ago. I'd say it's definitely worth it's price and would certainly recommend this frame to others.
customer_reviews.author: Eric P.

customer_reviews.title: Like this frame but..
customer_reviews.text: This frame I gave a five star because its sturdy and light so if you need to move it around its real easy. I gave the easy to assemble a 3 star because the junk instructions say use screw so and so with bar A well the screws are not labeled so not real straight forward when building this thing but if you have a half hour to spend with it you should be able to figure it out. Not sure why these manufactures are unable to write a simple label (everything labeled) instructions.I still would recommend despite the lack of labeled screws.
customer_reviews.author: smilebrightrado

customer_reviews.title: Best furniture buy ever
customer_reviews.text: This a fantastic bed frame. I've put together a lot of furniture in my time, and nothing has been easier than putting this one together. They even provide you two tools to put the screws in! Everything is labeled by numbers and there's an associated diagram to go with that to show how everything fits. It amazing It also looks very stylish, and very well made and sturdy, especially considering the price of this! I have a Japanese futon style bed(the kind that has a tatami mat under a flat "futon" that's basically just rolled out cotton into a mattress, and even with just this thin bedding between me and the wooden planks, it is suuuuuuper comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Better than the Zinus
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to assemble. Sturdy and great storage. I bought the Zinus Shawn 14 Inch SmartBase frame originally due to the insane amount of reviews, but found it to be noisy when lying down and moving around on it. It did not feel sturdy and just sounded cheap. Loving this frame in comparison and was not that more expensive. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine

customer_reviews.title: Built like a rock!
customer_reviews.text: The package arrived as a bunch of metal strips, wood, and bolts. It had fairly straightforward directions and the mounting holes were identified with numerical stickers corresponding to the instruction manual so you couldn't possibly screw it up. It took less than 30 minutes to bolt everything together and drop the wood slats in. Some of the wood slabs also have big strips of double-sided tape so that there is no possibility that your mattress will slide off with "activities" so no worries there. Most importantly to me, there are absolutely NO rattles or creaking when moving around or sleeping. No matter the rigorous activities taking place topside, the frame is built like a tank.
customer_reviews.author: Peter C

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I'm writing this review 6 months after I purchased my bed base. I needed something I could store my luggage under and I was so worried about the bed base being shaky or squeaky. This bed base is absolutely PERFECT! It fits all my luggage - ALL OF IT! It's very sturdy and makes absolutely NO NOISE whatsoever. I was so pleased with that purchase, I decided to get the twin size of it for my daughter after a 6-month test. Equally great! P.S: Super easy to put together! I'm officially in-love with Zinus! Pair with the iCoil 10-inch extra firm mattress. The perfect match!
customer_reviews.author: Rawda Tomoum

customer_reviews.title: assembly, looks, and quality on point
customer_reviews.text: honestly it should be illegal for firms to be this easy to assemble. i was done in like 10 minutes and didn’t have to ask for help. i’ve slept on it for about a week now and it hasn’t made any weird noises and my mattress hasn’t shifted around. the slats with velcro are absolutely brilliant. and i have plenty of space underneath to store things. i am truly surprised at the quality and simplicity for the price. it’s so easy to assemble, my dog could have done it.
customer_reviews.author: hannah fagan

customer_reviews.title: will break and ruin your hard wood floors!
customer_reviews.text: this thing was a pain to build, i bought this in 2018. it broke in 2019. the bottom legs are bent completely and the side of one side completely snapped where it meets the corner. bc the bottom “support” sticks broke, they have completely dug a TERRIBLE hole into the hardwood floor. on top of that, i’m trying to throw this thing out and it won’t come apart! oh, it also squeaks with every move you make. and all the screws come loose. and i was the only one sleeping on the bed. i am a 5’3 woman and weigh 130 lbs and it still did that much damage. so many regrets.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: I've put together 90% of everything I have by myself. I recently severed a tendon on my index finger of my dominant hand and had surgery on it. I can't do much. I was too anxious to wait for a friend to come help put the bed frame together so I just slid everything out of the box to see if it was doable. It took me 26 mins to assemble the frame, take my toddlers bed out of her room, put this one in, put her gel mattress on top and make the bed. Done mostly one handed. If I can do it, I'd say a lot of people can do it and probably under 10 mins.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Frame # 2 & Still happy
customer_reviews.text: This is my second frame. So easy to assemble I ordered a full size & it's wider than my mattress by approx 4 inches. I'm still happy with this buy. This was considered used but it was complete and no indication of it being used. I completely recommend this company & the 18" height is awesome and easy for underbed storage and for cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, easy to assemble bed frame
customer_reviews.text: Decided on this bed for its simplistic design, height (got the 18”), and price. All in all a good purchase. It was delivered to my door (live in the 2nd floor apartment) and packaged well. I assembled it alone and it took about half an hour and the instructions were clear and easy to follow. Also important that it came with all the supplies for assembly (Allen wrench, screws, spare parts, and a ratchet for tightening later if necessary). Love the look and it seems to support my 12” memory foam mattress very well).
customer_reviews.author: Hkpink18

customer_reviews.title: YES!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my lord. This frame...is absolutely AMAZING! I was terrified that it was damaged (the box was super torn and beat up) but everything was perfect. -labeled in an easy format -all hardware present -and adorable little ratchet -this thing will make your mattress look like a fortress My man has bad knees, so this accommodates our needs on many levels ;) GET THIS FRAME! I'm not being paid to give this review and didn't receive any free stuff. This thing was assembled with 3 glasses of wine and DUH-DAMN is it BEAUTIFUL! GAH! i'm so psyched. Worth every damn penny!
customer_reviews.author: Tessa

customer_reviews.title: Almost Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love this bed a lot because its super high and has lots of storage. The minimal look is also great for me but some people might want a bed skirt to cover the sides. The only issue is that this bed slides all over wood flooring and never stays close to the wall. The mattress I have does not like to stay put on the slats either. Would still recommend to anyone looking for storage in their room. I have a smaller apartment so it fits all my off season clothes, luggage, and shoes underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Nick C.

customer_reviews.title: Best frame ever
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this frame for a month now and I tell you what, it’s fantastic! Especially for the price. I have a memory foam mattress that was sooo uncomfortable with box springs I contemplated getting a whole new bed (not knowing it was the box springs causing the problem). But before a new mattress get a bed frame. This bed frame changed my mattress and made it more comfortable and I am now keeping it. 100% would recommend!! Also, my fiancé put the frame up in about 20 minutes (give or take)
customer_reviews.author: Windy

customer_reviews.title: Looks exactly like the photo
customer_reviews.text: Looks exactly like the photo. Heavy and supportive. Came in a huge box (I can't believe they used the USPS and not UPS for delivery, I ran into some problems because of that; the USPS just isn't set up for large deliveries like this). We putt his together in less than 30 minutes, everything is labeled, our power drill helped. Wood slats have velcro so they don't move, great design. The mattress hasn't shifted at all. I's definitely buy it again. One piece of advice, make sure to remove the stickers on the bars before you attach them, because once it's all together some of stickers are exposed and it's not easy to get off!
customer_reviews.author: A and S

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Extremely easy to put together (20 minutes give or take a few). Looks/feels sturdy. Great purchase! Will update if anything happens to make me change my mind. Ordered the queen size.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Check

customer_reviews.title: Wood slats, verywell put together!
customer_reviews.text: WOOD SLATS, not just metal bars across under mattress. Bought this after seeing it named in Top Ten Metal Bed Frames" list after seeing reviews about frames falling apart. They all have negative reviews in some percentage. (Maybe they were put together wrong.) Arrived on time! Easy assembly. Hubby set it up alone, "finnessed" the cross bars to fit, eased them into place with no problem. Sturdy. So nice to have the mattress off the floor after moving across country with no furniture and waiting for it to arrive once we were in our new home. Surprised and delighted in its appearance and stableness!
customer_reviews.author: Klynn

customer_reviews.title: No more nose when I turn over!
customer_reviews.text: Love this!!! So easy to put together!! All the tools come with it. It’s super sturdy and it doesn’t slide around on the floor, hence we have hardwood floors. Also, it comes with overs on all corners so it doesn’t scratch the floors!! So it won’t be making noise when get in and out of bed or if I turn at night!
customer_reviews.author: E.R.

customer_reviews.title: Solid, Sturdy and Looks Great!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this frame! It’s solid and very sturdy. Lots of storage space underneath and my kitties like going under there too. Packaged very nicely, arrived within two days of online purchase. It’s very heavy as well. Wasn’t too easy to assemble. A few reviews said 20 minutes? Nope! About 45 minutes total. Now that it’s all together, it is awesome! I’ll have a lengthy sleep tonight! Thank you! Definitely recommend for the price. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Easy and sturdy - may creak
customer_reviews.text: I love the sleek modern look. It's very sturdy and super easy to install. No creaks or movement. UPDATE: bed was creaking only after 8 months. I'm not a crazy sleeper, or have more than the required weight. I added furniture felt pads and it stopped completely. I have vinyl flooring. I'm assuming it was gripping to the floor too much and was causing the two poles to creak as it was being bent. It was an annoying thing to try and figure out, but hopefully it helps someone with the same issue. if you have carpet I'm sure you won't have this issue.
customer_reviews.author: hildreth

customer_reviews.title: Sleek Design and Lots of Storage
customer_reviews.text: First of all - I would have reviewed this differently, had I actually read further before my purchase. Was hoping to have a headboard, but after the product had already shipped, I read further on reviews that it was not compatible with a headboard. Now searching for a hanging headboard to complete the look. Overall - It seemed simple to set up, and after about a few days it seems to be holding up just fine with my husband and I (approximately 350-360 pounds total). We have a Tempur-Pedic Breeze on it and no box spring. The amount of storage space beneath the bed is great! Will try to update in a few weeks with another review.
customer_reviews.author: S. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble -
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I gave this four stars instead of 5 is because its a little fragile. The first unit I received I had to return because it showed up with one of the rods severely bent in shipping. That said, this frame is a snap to assemble. In fact, I found it more complicated to actually read the instructions than to just assemble it using the numbers on the various attachment points. The storage space is actually larger than I thought as well and was perfect for luggage.
customer_reviews.author: Erma Jane Davis

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: My son had a twin Zinus mattress for two years and we liked it. So we decided to upgrade his mattress to a full and bought the frame from them as well. Seems sturdy. It was also easy to put together. The cube storage bin in the picture is 11”x 10.5”x10.5” for reference on storage space.
customer_reviews.author: pippi

customer_reviews.title: Not good for bigger beds
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this platform due to the reviews but the platform did not meet my expectations. I got a king size, maybe these platforms are better when smaller. Easy to assemble. Every time anyone lays on (including small children) the bed it feels like its going to break in the center. Sides are fine tho, but still center is not fully supported.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Modern and fun :)
customer_reviews.text: Really cool bed, super easy to assemble. I was hoping to use the underneath part for some storage but I can only fit a few small things under there, but that's ok. No squeaking or wobbling, very stable. Adult activities haven't done any damage to this bed. It is the modern look I was going for and it helps open up my space and make my room feel larger while also keeping my mattress off of the floor away from spiders.
customer_reviews.author: Krugs

customer_reviews.title: EASY PEASY LEMON SQUEEZY
customer_reviews.text: It was ridiculously easy to put together. I got the Queen size 18in for my 6.5 by 11 foot tiny NYC apartment bedroom. It took us maybe 20-30 mins for 2 people together. You definitely need 2 sets of hands because the box is so heavy! Plenty of room for storage underneath. I haven’t slept on it yet so I can’t say if it’s sturdy or doesn’t squeak but it seems promising! All in all, very satisfied for the price.
customer_reviews.author: darcard

customer_reviews.title: sturdy, stylish and easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: These beds are for a guest room of a cabin. Wanted something that didn't require a box spring, lower to ground and easy on the budget. I bought 2 twins, 2 queens. Instructions for assembly are simple- parts are marked so you simply put part 1 to part 1 on other piece and screw together. I put together 4 frames in less than 1 hour by myself. they are sturdy and you can store something underneath if wanted. I put strips of felt pads underneath so I can easily slide bed around to sweep and dust underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Lg

customer_reviews.title: Nice bed frame, but poor customer service
customer_reviews.text: I like this bed frame and it looks nice plus it has plenty of storage beneath it. 18 inches of storage which is nice. But I do not like that there is no way to attach the headboard to it. I called customer service and they were not as helpful as I would expect this company to be. They did not offer any solutions I had to ask specific questions. They also hurried me off the phone. As if they didn’t have enough time to solve the problem. So I give it three stars.
customer_reviews.author: Diane E

customer_reviews.title: Easiest thing to set up!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in September. The box never made it on the truck, the first time. Amazon's amazing staff cancelled original order and reordered for me. This was the easiest thing in the world to set up! My two year old helped, had he been 6 or 7 he probably could have done it by himself! I was impressed that the needed tools came with, as well as some extra screws. The accordion style wood flats are pretty handy as well, no measuring/spacing required. It's been two months and I still think it's a really great frame, supports the Tuft and Needle matress perfectly! Conveniently it has room under it for totes, I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Angela G.

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good. However...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this bed for over a month now, it's pretty sturdy. No squeaks...yet. My concern is that the sticky thingies it comes with to hold the bed in place, didn't have a strong enough glue, they complete came off. So my bed moves out of place easily. I don't know how i can go about to fix it. I love the bed design, but I'm afraid this will eventually cause damage somehow.
customer_reviews.author: Word Bunny

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: I have had this product for a month now and it works well for the price. It is sturdy and I have noticed a difference in my back pain. I recently purchased a new mattress but quickly realized my bed frame was a huge problem. The frame itself took me an hour to assemble (I am no way handy) but it was easy overall. My room seems bigger too, with a smaller frame. I am not able to store anything under the bed, but I also got the shortest frame. Overall I would give it a great buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy & quick to assemble. Sturdy yet light and easy to move.
customer_reviews.text: Easy & quick to assemble (and also dissemble), I can do that easily just by myself. The end joints are nicely done. Sturdy structure yet light and easy to move. A lot of details like there's number indicating which two ends should come together, there are adhesive tapes to keep the wooden planks in place. The moment I find it real amazing was that when I needed to move out.. they can just be dissembled, so easy for move or storage, and doesn't take up much space of your U-haul truck.
customer_reviews.author: Eve yoo

customer_reviews.title: I was and I am still not a happy camper about this product
customer_reviews.text: I was and I am still not a happy camper about this product. It was missing pieces and screws. I even had previous persons return label and garbage in the box that was sent to me. Including previous person's private information. Not happy with this product at all and can't seem to find another one I thought I was going to like as well. I am very disappointed. I would really like to buy this again and hope I would get all the pieces and screws since I can't find anything else, but I am not sure I want to go through all the trouble again incase I didn't get all my pieces and screws. 😞
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The manufacturer doesn’t care about safety
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your time or money. Purchased this in ‘like new’ condition. Received the product with missing support bars. When I contacted the manufacturer they said they couldn’t help because it wasn’t new so warranty wasn’t valid. This isn’t a warranty issue. This is a safety issue. The product was incomplete and therefore nothing more than an oversized paperweight. Returning today! Also - multiple points where the bed frame comes together. The welding was off so bringing was impossible. POS
customer_reviews.author: Corey Fancher

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Low Profile
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't be happier! This was purchased for our toddler who converted from a crib bed to "big boy" full. We needed something that could support the memory foam mattress, but was low enough so he could easily get in and out of bed. This fit the bill. Setup was easy and with no faulty pieces. Note: We were originally sent a folding table instead of the bed, but Amazon took care of the issue right away. The second delivery was correct.
customer_reviews.author: Soda Star

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Its easy to assemble, its really sturdy. I have a queen mattress and I love how it fits on the frame. Whoever made this frame really thought of a lot of important details, like no slide stickers and rubber. The tools used to put it together are awesome. The only thing I would maybe change are the instructions. They are simple but it takes a sec to figure it out because of HOW simple they are. Pay attention the the pics closely so you don't assemble a couple of pieces upside down or something.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BRILLIANT- about time!!
customer_reviews.text: FINALLY - a company that got it right!! Stupid proofed directions, parts, and tools. It was so so easy. They gave you tools to make it simple and less time consuming, everything matched up in directions to pictures to parts. I hate putting things together from boxes because parts are missing, directions suck or are non existent, tools are cheap.....not this place. Put this together in record time, super sturdy, and will be buying from again!! THANK YOU
customer_reviews.author: AC34

customer_reviews.title: simple, sturdy, and well-priced.
customer_reviews.text: This is frame is easy to put together. I did it alone in about an hour- taking my time. It came right away and package is compact but heavy. I got the king sized one. I recommend if you choose the king sized that you make sure you know where you will use it. You don't want to have to move it around later. It is sturdy and with that, you can expect heavy. But it is basic, so you can easily move it around one room. I would not like to take it apart to move. I bought other more expensive and found this to work just as well. I am fully satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: James Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Dream come True!
customer_reviews.text: I've always wanted a low profile bed because it's reminiscent of what I've seen in Asian bedrooms. I LOVE IT. I was so excited to find I could assemble it myself (I've never had to assemble furniture before) and I even bought it used from Amazon and nothing was missing or broken. It's perfect! And I've dropped onto it several times and thought, "Oh gosh, I'm going to break it!" but obviously I haven't. I love this easy to assemble low profile bed and highly recommend it! :)
customer_reviews.author: A. Bourassa

customer_reviews.title: Easy Assembly - looks great!
customer_reviews.text: This bed frame was a BREEZE to put together. I did it on my own, and didn't have a single moment where I needed a second set of hands, The directions are a little vauge, but only because assembly is so stinkin' simple. I put this up in about 30 minutes, if it even took that long. The best part was it came with an allen wrench ratchet. It made assembly so much faster. It feels sturdy, my mattress doesn't slide around, and it looks great. I could not be more satisfied! 10/10 would purchase again, and strongly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mai

customer_reviews.title: 6” Very low, but simple and very easy to put together.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble. My daughter and I stuck the pieces together, and my husband just drilled the screws in. It does come with tools, you don’t need a drill, it’s just much faster using a drill. Cute basic 6” is very low to the floor. Very sturdy, solid. I originally ordered the 10” but it would have taken too long to get here (estimated arrival, over a month). The 6” arrived in about a week. I hate how low to the floor it is but otherwise it’s great.
customer_reviews.author: NishaNikole

customer_reviews.title: Overall, a good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I ordered it from Amazon's Warehouse and saved a few bucks. Slightly frustrating to assemble. The first bolt went in easy, but there were 3 others that almost made me break it down and return it. The holes were not in line, but after a few cranks, I got them screwed in. Sturdy for what I need, but in terms of having 'relations' on it, I can't attest to it. It sits on a thin area rug on a hardwood floor. The storage capacity is awesome. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Twilla

customer_reviews.title: Fashionable and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Had it for a week. Was super easy to assemble by myself. The bed doesn’t shift or wiggle, and I have a pet that jumps on it. Can’t feel it or hear frame creak. I also shift and move a lot at night, and I like it when my bed stays in place. Looks great. I got the shortest bed frame I could find so I and my pet can get on and off easier. So not much room under to fit anything but my pet when they are scared. Which is what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: C. A. Rowanwax

customer_reviews.title: Even better than imagined
customer_reviews.text: I saw the reviews saying that this bed is easy to assemble and good for storage capacity. The true bed nevertheless exceeds my expectation. The frames are marked with numbers which are clear and easy to find, and they can be useful the next time I move. The bed is definitely sturdy - even without the strips to help keep the mattress in place. The underbed storage space is very good, and I can store all my pillows and shoes and unwanted items down there, making my closet empty. This is fascinating!
customer_reviews.author: utuvien

customer_reviews.title: constantly repositioning bed
customer_reviews.text: It slips and slides on all types of flooring when getting in and out of the bed. Even when my 50lb dog hops onto this bed, it moves from its position and needs constant repositioning. I weigh 115lb and this frame still shifts around on my wood flooring. Intercourse is nearly impossible on this bed when it’s sliding all over the place. I’d only recommend this bed frame if you have carpeting in the bedroom or if you plan on keeping your bed tightly in the corner. Update: It has been approximately 4 weeks since receiving the bed, and it has already begun creaking.
customer_reviews.author: THE CUSTOMER YOU WANT

customer_reviews.title: Simple to Assemble!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this, and was able to build it up in about 30 minutes, all by myself. Instructions are pretty clear, ,and everything is well-labeled. It gives a of storage opportunity if you live in an apartment with small footprint. Thus far it's sturdy and holding its own. Will update this review in a couple months to see how this is holding up.
customer_reviews.author: BruinSkiiz

product_meta.title: Zinus Joseph 6 Inch Metal Platforma Bed Frame / Mattress Foundation / Wood Slat Support / No Box Spring Needed / Sturdy Steel Structure, Twin
product_meta.description: Size:Twin| Style:6 InchThis sturdy modern Studio platform a mattress foundation is designed for strength and style. Perfect for higher profile mattresses or those preferring a modern style. The extra strength steel framed mattress foundation by Zinus features wooden slats that provide strong support for your memory foam, latex, or spring mattress. 6 inches high and compatible with or without a box spring. Easy to assemble and arrives in a narrow box to make moving through hallways and upstairs easier. Another comfort innovation from Zinus. Pioneering comfort.
feature_bullets: Your purchase includes One Zinus Joseph Metal Platforma Bed Frame, 6-Inches in Twin Size with all required tools for assembly. Mattress is not included
Bed frame dimensions: 38" W x 75" L x 6" H. Weight limit: 250 lbs. Bed frame weight: 32.4lbs. Space between slats: 3.5”. Clearance space: 4”
Foam padded tape is added to the steel frame for noise free use and non-slip tape on the wooden slats prevents your mattress from moving
Bed frame is not originally design for heat/foot board compatibility.
Use with any style: memory foam, spring and/or hybrid mattresses. Using bed frame with air/water mattresses is not recommended.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars10,629 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
